name: OkuDoku Number Brain Challenge
description:
OkuDoku is a combination of 2 classic games Sudoku and Tetris. We have tried to take all the best from those two games to create a truly challenging experience for puzzle lovers.
You can play against yourself by beating your own high score or compete in Daily Challenges.

The game is easy to play but in order to completed Daily Challenges and get a really high score, you will need to plan your moves a few steps ahead.


How to play:
1. Drag and drop numbers on the board
2. Build lines or squares that contain numbers from 1 to 4
3. You score every time you complete a line or a square with all numbers from 1 to 4
4. Lines and squares are cleared once all the numbers from 1 to 4 are added
5. Plan your moves in order to combine multiple lines and squares in order to get even higher score
6. Game ends when you don’t have any available moves left


Daily Challenge:
- Every day we release a new challenge for you to play
- Challenge is started with a predefined set of numbers on the board
- The goal is reach a high score and not to run out of moves too quickly


Please don’t forget to leave a review with your feedback & suggestion, so we can make our game even better!
